content:
That's wonderful! It's great to hear that you've been enjoying your sculpting classes and are excited to explore ceramic jewelry making. Combining your sculpting skills with ceramic jewelry making will surely open up new creative possibilities and allow you to express yourself in unique and fascinating ways.

@claycreations sounds like an excellent resource, and it's fantastic that you've found an account that inspires and motivates you to try new techniques. Social media platforms like Instagram can be incredibly valuable for learning and staying updated on various art forms, and it's wonderful that you're taking advantage of that.

As you start experimenting with ceramic jewelry making, remember to have fun and be patient with yourself. It's a new medium, and it may take some time to get the hang of it. Don't be afraid to make mistakes or try new things – they're an essential part of the learning process.

You might also consider sharing your own work and progress on social media or with your sculpting community. It's a great way to connect with like-minded artists, get feedback, and stay motivated.

Keep us updated on your progress, and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need any guidance. We're always here to help!
